website_summaries.verdict: The Speedcross 3 GTX from Salomon is a well-known trail shoe that presents itself with effective systems and features that are meant for the trail runner. It has some support mechanics that keep the foot comfortable and cradled while keeping performance consistent.
pros: The GORE-TEX membrane offers waterproof protection for the foot in any weather
Water-resistant textiles make up the rest of the upper unit of the Speedcross 3 GTX, making sure that the foot stays dry and cool even when inside the shoe
Runners were generally receptive of all the features that were included as a means to heighten the protection of the foot
The cushioning system keeps the foot well-supported and cradled, ensuring a responsive ride
The outsole unit is made up of the Mud and Snow Contagrip, a durable layer that functions well even on wet surfaces
cons: The shoe break down after only a few months of use
The outsole gripping lugs of the 3rd version of the Speedcross GTX were observed by some runners to break off easily
Some felt that the arch needed additional support
This is a heavy running shoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but they do come up small and to Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: These are a good quality well made shoe, the grip is very good on the wet and muddy trails I run and being water proof is great. The problem I have found though, is although I ordered one size up on my normal shoe size I am finding the width to narrow. They felt OK when I tried them on and had a walk around but after running my usual 10k runs I am finding my toes are painfull and made one bleed, never had this before with my Asics. I didn't think I had a particularly wide foot! So if you do, then I would look elsewhere as this has turned out a rather expensive mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and hard wearing
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and hard wearing, shouldn't need another pair for some time. Also easy to clean either with a cloth or just throw in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Salomon Speedcross 3 - Awesome! Watch the sizing though...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shoes great for off-road running. The size is small so you will need to go up a size for wide feet or half a size for narrow. I am a wide size UK10 and purchased size UK11 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ade

customer_reviews.title: Super item but just too small
customer_reviews.text: Super item but just too small. Managed to get a 12 which were perfect. Wore for whole weekend and no blisters at all . Great trail shoes
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Fiona Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good old salamon . . fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic as always from salamon completely waterproof and super comfortable and light fantastic trail running shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Marple

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. My normal shoe size is 6/39 but for these, I go up a half size to 6.5 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few Salomon shoes now and all are very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best shoes
customer_reviews.text: have bought 3 so far so for the past 4 years and for the next 5-6 i have shoes to wear.. love the laces system
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Would like a fraction more width in toe box but enjoy running the trails in these.
customer_reviews.author: julian wensley-smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First pair of these type of trainers but loving them so far .
customer_reviews.author: steven webster

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainers. Unbelievable grip and extremely lightweight. Quite a narrow fit but very comfortable and durable and look great. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pozyczka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small so I sent them back. Still waiting for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Slightly narrow to begin with, but stretching to fit.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon asked me to review so I will do so, but it is a bit too early. I have only used the shoes a few times. My first impression was that although long enough, the shoes were too narrow. However, they have already started to stretch to a comfortable fit. I use the shoes on public footpaths on the fields around my village. They give excellent grip in the dry, and release mud rather than letting it accumulate in the damp. The quality and designate very good. i think I will be very pleased with this purchase once the shoes are fully "run in", but for the time being I will give four rather than five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ian T

customer_reviews.title: Great Service and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Runmarkt - the suppliers- are fantastic! The order was delivered in time for Valentines day, even after the expected delivery date was 5 days ahead! I'd definitely buy from them again... Oh and the shoes are perfect too! My fiance is on his 4th pair now and uses them for everyday use, as well as for running! Ideal for use in rainy Irish days, these shoes are as waterproof as they can possibly get!
customer_reviews.author: catsa86

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but too small, have asked for larger
customer_reviews.text: Seem to come out smaller than my old salomon's. Not sure why they can't be consistent in sizing for shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Roland Hewes

customer_reviews.title: wrong colour delivered
customer_reviews.text: Wrong colour delivered. Already sent email about this including picture of colour ordered. No reply. The salomon is an excellent trail shoe, first race last weekend the worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: gerry moss

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Speedcross 3 GTX Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Lighter, faster and more aggressive trail running shoe for competition or for high-speed training. This season with the thermoregulation of GORE-TEX.
feature_bullets: GORE-TEX Upper - Offers complete waterproof protection to help your feet stay dry at all times.
Sensifit - Actively cradles the foot to deliver a secure and precise fit for maximum stability.
Quicklace System - Minimal and robust, this one-pull lace tightening system secures the shoe quickly and provides excellent stability and support.
Contagrip Outsole - Utilises a blend of softer, harder and grippier Contagrip compounds to yield the perfect mix of performance and durability.
OrthoLite Sockliner - OrthoLite foam and EVA heel cup work in concert to create a cooler, drier, healthier internal environment.
